Hello World!.content: Welcome to Blag - the useless blogging thing written in (currently) 2 days. Features: 1 user max! Unremovable posts! Unsecure password handling? Unfinished dashboard! And moar! The entire thing will be a WIP forever! Yay!

Test.content:
MAKE IT SO THAT THE HOME BUTTON DOESN'T LOG YOU OUT
Add JSON file generation to install.php
Fix problems
Increase security

Blag?.content: Another reason it could be called a blag is because it causes server lag. Not much though. Lack of an actual database may be the problem - this thing uses a single JSON file to store stuff! Which is part of why things aren't deletable. They are, however, editable - if you make a post with the same name as another, it replaces it :D
